item.title: Add PhotoshopCS5 support to Picasa
item.description: If you are like me you use Picasa to manage your photos, but recognize that the editing options are very limited. You can easily add a button in Picasa that will allow you to edit the current picture in photoshop. I took an existing button built for PhotoshopCS3 and updated it to work with this more contemporary version. Itâ€™s limited to working only on Windows. Install Photoshop CS5 Button in Picasa
